title: Cursor 2.2: Debug Mode and Visual Editor
description: Cursor released version 2.2 with Debug Mode that automatically instruments apps with runtime logs to identify and fix bugs, a Visual Editor for the Cursor Browser that unifies design and code work, multi-agent judging for code quality evaluation, and improved Plan Mode for complex tasks.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor 2.2 Debug Mode fixed my bugs automatically - game changer for troubleshooting
Debug Mode is a game-changer for tackling larger tasks without getting bogged down in details

title: Copilot Memory Feature Public Preview
description: GitHub Copilot Memory feature is now in public preview for Pro and Pro+ subscribers, allowing Copilot to learn from your codebase and remember context across sessions for improved project understanding over time.

title: Agent Skills Support
description: GitHub Copilot now supports Agent Skills, allowing developers to create folders containing instructions, scripts, and resources that Copilot automatically loads when relevant. Skills work across Copilot coding agent, CLI, and VS Code Insiders, with stable VS Code support coming in early January.

community_feedback.quote: Updated my community Copilot agents to use skills and memory - all agents use memory natively via the memory-contract skill
Agent Skills represent a significant step toward more specialized AI assistance

title: Async Background Agents
description: Claude Code now supports asynchronous background agents that can run tasks in parallel while you continue working. Agents can be sent to background with Ctrl+B and automatically hook back in when complete, enabling parallel AI development workflows.

community_feedback.quote: The ability to continue working while agents complete tasks in the background is highlighted as a major productivity booster
Background agents changed how I ship code - parallel development is transformative
Claude Code Background Agents can boost development speed 3.8Ã— and reduce context-switch burnout

title: LSP Support and VS Code Integration
description: Claude Code released native LSP (Language Server Protocol) support for better code intelligence and language understanding, along with improved VS Code extension integration including multi-terminal setup support and syntax highlighting toggle.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code gets native LSP support - significant improvement for code intelligence

title: No December Updates - Latest from November
description: No new updates found for Windsurf in December 2025. The most recent version is 1.12.28 from November 3, 2025, which included expanded Codemaps with chat capabilities, Mermaid diagrams, and Cascade summarization fixes.
